name: Luck Ludo
description:
Want to enjoy uninterrupted pleasure on your mobile phone? Install LuckLudo to play everyone's favorite childhood board game!

LuckLudo is the latest free Ludo game, we have the most gorgeous dice and board design, as well as the most exciting and classic game rules.

With LuckLudo, you can start a thrilling game with your friends or family anytime, anywhere. Especially you can match Ludo fans from all over the world for an exciting game in LuckLudo.

We have the best benefits. You can get gold coins and diamonds by daily check-in and daily tasks to enjoy the game .

While the gameplay is simple, you still need enviable luck and unparalleled strategy to grasp the whole picture. Once you play with higher-level players, you will find the whole game more challenging.

Roll the dice, move the pieces, and reach the end. Defeat the other players and be the strongest Ludo king!
What are you waiting for? Let's roll the dice!
